name: Juice Pop Mania
description:
Swap, match, and pop tasty fruit in Juice Pop Mania the completely free new match 3 game! Use your skills to blast through hundreds of fun and creative fruit filled levels, and get caught up in the newest casual puzzle game Mania!

Game features:
-Hundreds of tasty levels!
Every day a new puzzle challenge with hundreds of levels and dynamic obstacles that make every level fun and exciting.

-Seamless puzzle game play:
Juice Pop Mania is lightweight and straight to the point - get straight to the puzzles without waiting on timers, candy hearts, or clicking through text bubbles.

-No wifi, no problem!:
Juice Pop Mania plays straight from your phone, so you can play as much as you want even when you have no wifi or no internet.

-Relax and train your brain!:
Enjoy the happy, fun, and relaxing casual atmosphere while solving challenging puzzles that will make you think twice in order to earn that tasty high-score.

-Fun and colorful graphics!:
Filled with tasty fruit like apple, strawberry, grape and pear, Juice Pop Mania's graphics are sweet as candy. Crush and jam fruit with a smile!

-Free items every day!:
Some other free match 3 puzzle games design levels that are difficult to pass without buying items, but not Juice Pop Mania! We give you free items every day to make the game more fun even for casual players.

-This tasty fruit is always fresh!:
The Juice Pop Mania team are the real fun makers! They are always working on new and exciting puzzle levels for you to match and play in.

Juice Pop Mania is:
- A casual match 3 puzzle game that is easy to play but still challenging at higher levels.
- Always adding new levels for your puzzle happiness.
- A seamless puzzle experience where you need no wifi and no payment to progress.
- Lots and lots of fun!
